entry.title: $2375 // Sweet Williamsburg 1 BR - Close To Trains - NO FEE!
entry.content:
Spacious 1BR in Williamsburg with queen sized bedroom, closet space, newly renovated kitchen and spacious living room. Brand new hardwood floors and charming exposed brick throughout. Central heat and a/c! You do not want to miss out on this awesome place.

Transportation:
2 minutes to the JMZ at Hewes St
4 minutes to the G at Broadway
6 minutes to the L and G at Lorimer/Metropolitan Ave

--NO BROKER FEE--

Text or email Anthony
show contact info



__WILLIAMSBURG__

entry.title: $2275 // Gorgeous Apt in Luxury, Amenity-filled Building in BUSHWICK
entry.content:
No Broker Fee! 1 month free on a 14 month lease!

Gorgeous studio apartment at the RHEINGOLD in Bushwick!
Unit features floor-to-ceiling windows, hardwood floors, frosted glass cabinetry, subway tiled bathroom walls. most of Rheingold's residences feature terraces or balconies.

The Rheingold is filled with tons of incredible amenities, including but not limited to:
24-hour doorman, ample onsite laundry, professional workspaces, landscaped outdoor areas, fitness center, health & wellness amenities, art & music studios, yoga studio, movie theater and much more!

Conveniently located near many bars, coffee shops, restaurants, and grocery stores. Walking distance to the J and M lines.

- 1 month free on an 14 month lease!
- First and security required at lease signing
- No broker fee
- Pets allowed

This apartment won't be available for long. For more information on this unit, or to schedule a private viewing, call or text Yosef (Joe) immediately - show contact info

(Net fee advertised)
